EmailTemplate.description: Template to send potential leads to Sales/Account Team when a non-account holding contact requests a booking
EmailTemplate.name: New Lead from Booking
EmailTemplate.subject: New Lead from Booking for a contact without an account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello
A booking has been requested from {!Booking__c.Contact_First_Name__c} {!Booking__c.Contact_Last_Name__c} at {!Booking__c.Company_Name__c}.
This contact does not have an existing account with TNT, and could be considered a potential account lead.
Please check the following booking and follow up as necessary:
{!Booking__c.Link}
